categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Kiri was a trainee in the ways of the Force as a Jedi youngling. Living in the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant, Kiri was a member of Wolf Clan alongside Lina Lascol, Lartan, Mox Freedan and the male Ezak.

Kiri was mentioned in the third volume of The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, a Star Wars encyclopedia published in 2008. Only Kiri's inclusion in Wolf Clan was mentioned, but neither species nor gender were revealed.
